summary: This is an email from a US Attorney's Office (likely New York Southern District) regarding FOIA request EOUSA-2021-000288. It includes an exemption form for review and signature and lists specific categories of audio, video, photographic, and other records being requested for two cases involving Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of two referenced cases: a civil case (15-cv-7433) and a criminal case (20 Cr. 330). The FOIA request seeks records related to her, her properties, and associates.

persons.name: Kevina Tidwell
persons.context: Name appears in the email subject line in association with 'Blue Ant Studios'.

keyFacts: A FOIA request (EOUSA-2021-000288, 2020R00719) is being processed for records related to Ghislaine Maxwell cases.

The request seeks a wide range of media including 911 calls, interviews with victims/witnesses/relatives, surveillance of properties/associates, and depositions involving Jeffrey Epstein (JE) and Ghislaine Maxwell (GM).
Two specific cases are referenced: Ghislaine Maxwell 15-cv-7433 (LAP) and United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
An exemption form is attached for review and signature, indicating some records may be withheld from public release.
The document indicates an active effort to gather investigative and prosecutorial evidence in late 2020.
